statements: SELECT * FROM treatment_plans
SELECT plan_id, assessment_data FROM treatment_plans
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY plan_id DESC
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE plan_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
SELECT plan_id, patient_preferences FROM treatment_plans LIMIT 3
SELECT plan_id, assessment_data->>'type' AS assessment_type FROM treatment_plans WHERE assessment_data->>'status' = 'completed' ORDER BY plan_id DESC
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_preferences @> '{"treatment": "physical therapy"}'
SELECT plan_id, assessment_data FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY plan_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT plan_id, assessment_data->'medications' AS medications FROM treatment_plans WHERE assessment_data ? 'medications'
SELECT plan_id, assessment_data, patient_preferences FROM treatment_plans WHERE assessment_data->>'status' = 'pending' AND patient_preferences ? 'follow_up' ORDER BY plan_id
SELECT * FROM assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, assessment_date FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT assessment_id, COUNT(*) FROM treatment_plans GROUP BY assessment_id;
SELECT treatment_description, treatment_notes FROM treatment_plans WHERE plan_id = '765e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, JSONB_VALUE(assessment_data, '$.blood_pressure') AS blood_pressure FROM assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, assessment_data->'weight' AS weight FROM assessments WHERE JSONB_VALUE(assessment_data, '$.weight_units') = 'kg';
SELECT assessments.assessment_id, assessments.patient_id, treatment_plans.treatment_description FROM assessments JOIN treatment_plans ON assessments.assessment_id = treatment_plans.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM assessment_data;
SELECT patient_id, assessment_score, assessment_date FROM assessment_data ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT patient_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessment_data WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessment_data ORDER BY assessment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM assessment_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, assessment_date FROM assessment_data ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, MAX(assessment_score) AS max_score FROM assessment_data GROUP BY assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_preferences WHERE preferred_treatment = 'Physical Therapy' ORDER BY treatment_frequency ASC;
SELECT treatment_description, assessment_score FROM treatment_plans JOIN assessment_data ON treatment_plans.assessment_id = assessment_data.assessment_id WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_score FROM assessment_data;
SELECT patient_id, preferred_treatment FROM patient_preferences;
SELECT plan_name, plan_description FROM treatment_plans;
SELECT patient_id, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM assessment_data;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_description FROM treatment_plans;
SELECT * FROM assessment_data ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, assessment_score ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT assessment_id,patient_id,assessment_date,assessment_score FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT p.patient_id,p.preferred_treatment,tp.plan_name,tp.plan_description FROM patient_preferences p JOIN treatment_plans tp ON p.preferred_treatment = tp.plan_name;
SELECT pa.assignment_id,tp.plan_name,pa.assignment_date FROM plan_assignments pa JOIN treatment_plans tp ON pa.plan_id = tp.plan_id ORDER BY pa.assignment_date DESC;
SELECT p.patient_id,p.preferred_treatment,ad.assessment_score FROM patient_preferences p LEFT JOIN assessment_data ad ON p.patient_id = ad.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM assessment_data;
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, assessment_date FROM assessment_data ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
SELECT assessment_result FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, preferred_treatment FROM patient_preferences;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_id, patient_id, physician_id FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessment_data WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT assessment_result, assessment_date FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, preferred_treatment FROM patient_preferences WHERE preferred_physician = 'Dr. Smith'
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = 3 AND plan_id < 10
SELECT physician_name, specialization FROM physicians ORDER BY physician_name
